channel.title: Posts on Duing Dev
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Duing Dev

item.title: My best idea of 2022
item.description: During 2022, a lot of things happened. I graduated from university, got my first job, and moved to a new one, the second one being my first international experience within the programming industry. While working, I also continued the development of my graduation thesis with the help of my friend and mentor Edil Medeiros. All these experiences were great on their own, but they don’t even get close to how good the idea of a study group was.

item.title: Circular Programming or Corecursion
item.description: Disclaimer I created this post during the make of my graduation project more than one and half years ago. This post served as training of a topic I had the intention of talking about in the final thesis – something that ended up not happening. I’ve made a presentation on Dr.Nekoma about the topic, given how interesting it is. The following is the original post. Introduction Here I present a very descriptive explanation of a solution to a simple example problem.
